summary: Restaurant booking app that shows a hotel/restaurant offer ad on launch, lists available restaurants on the home tab, provides restaurant detail pages with menu and table booking, and includes a second bottom-nav tab for Instagram-style short advertisement reels.
architectural_notes: Use a bottom navigation bar with two primary tabs: Home (restaurant list) and Reels (short video ads).
Include a restaurant/hotel detail view that links menu viewing and table booking.

existing_features.title: Implement a bottom navigation with two tabs: (1) Home (restaurant/hotel listings) and (2) Reels (Instagram-style short advertisement reels).
Show a launch/opening advertisement for a hotel offer when the app is opened, presented as a dismissible full-screen or modal ad.
Create a Home tab that lists all available restaurants/hotels, showing key summary info for each and allowing navigation to a detail view.
Implement a restaurant/hotel detail view that displays the menu for that restaurant/hotel.
Implement a table booking flow from the restaurant/hotel detail view, allowing a user to submit a booking request for a given date/time and party size.
Implement the Reels tab as a vertically scrollable feed of short advertisement reels for hotels/restaurants, each reel supporting video playback with basic controls (play/pause, mute/unmute).

Provide a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and apply it consistently across Home, Detail, Booking, and Reels screens. Do not use a blue/purple primary palette.
Add generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., app logo and a generic offer banner image), storing them under frontend/public/assets/generated.

Add a documented, reproducible process to produce an Android APK for the current web app, including all required project files/configuration in-repo so a developer can run the build locally and generate a debug APK.
Add a standard way to export/share the full project source code as a single ZIP archive, including frontend and backend code and any required configuration files.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show an opening/launch advertisement for a hotel offer
Restaurant/hotel detail page with menu display
Table booking flow from restaurant/hotel detail page
Bottom navigation with two tabs: Home and Short Reels
Instagram-style short reels feed for hotel advertisement videos

Create backend data models and APIs to support: (a) restaurants/hotels, (b) menu items per restaurant/hotel, (c) bookings, and (d) reels (video URL + metadata). Provide query methods for lists and details, and an update method to create bookings.
Seed the app with sample content so it is usable immediately after deployment: at least 5 restaurants/hotels with menus, at least 5 reels, and 1 launch offer ad configuration.
Provide an Android APK build for the app
Provide a zipped archive of the app source code for download/sharing

projectName: Restaurant booking app with launch offer ad, home listings, detail+menu+table booking, and short reels tab
